title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 04, 2016

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate





	NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:

	Patrick A. Burke, of the District of Columbia, to be United States Marshal for the District of Columbia for the term of four years, vice Edwin Donovan Sloane, retired.

	Stephanie A. Finley, of Louisiana, to be United States District Judge for the Western District of Louisiana, vice Richard T. Haik, Sr., retired.

	Claude J. Kelly III, of Louisiana, to be United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Louisiana, vice Ivan L. R. Lemelle, retired.
